issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
{noformat}
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.proto.ClientNamenodeProtocolProtos$DeleteSnapshotRequestProto$Builder.setSnapshotName(ClientNamenodeProtocolProtos.java:17509)

	at org.apache.hadoop.io.retry.RetryInvocationHandler.invoke(RetryInvocationHandler.java:103)
	at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy15.deleteSnapshot(Unknown Source)

fields.summary: deleteSnapshot throws NPE when snapshotname is null

comments.body:
Thanks for the work [~brahmareddy]. I've a quick comment.

In tests, please use {{GenericTestUtils.assertExceptionContains}} instead of directly using e.getMessage.contains(""). Could you refer [TestDataStorage.java#L173|https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/trunk/hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/server/datanode/TestDataStorage.java#L173] to know the usage.

Thanks [~brahmareddy] for creating the patch. I'm thinking the regression test should not be in {{TestNameNodeRetryCache.java}} since this issues is not related to retry cache. Would you add the test in {{TestNameNodeRpcServer}} or creating a new test class?
[~ajisakaa] thanks a lot for taking a look into this issue.uploaded the patch to separate the testcase..kindly review..
